title.narrative: Strengthening Public Information, Monitoring, Evaluation for Results Management in Colombia

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to assist the Borrower in strengthening its monitoring and evaluation system to ensure the availability and production of quality of information pertinent to improving the Borrower's: (i) program and policy design by CONPES and government entities; (ii) social accountability by the Office of the President; (iii) investment planning by DNP; and (iv) monitoring and evaluation capabilities, at the local and regional levels.

title.narrative: Percentage of increase in visits from citizens to Sinergia

comment.narrative: From end July 2011 through end July 2012, 45,606 citizens had visited Sinergia. This number number will serve as the baseline tomonitor percentage increases. (A previous version of the ISR incorrectly reported the number of visits during this time as 63,340).
Due to the recent extension, the end target date has been extended from March 15, 2014 to December 31, 2014.
Between July 31, 2012 and July 31, 2014 the total number of visits by citizens to Sinergia was 261,329. This represents a 573.01%increase from the baseline.

title.narrative: Percentage of increase in visits of the High Government to Control Panels

comment.narrative: From end July 2011 through end July 2012, there were 2,326 visits of the High Government to the Control Panels. This number willserve as the baseline to monitor percentage increase. (A previous version of the ISR incorrectly reported the baseline as43,690).
Due to the recent extension, the end target date has been extended from March 15, 2014 to December 31, 2014.
The total number of visits from high government to control panels from July 31, 2012 to July 31, 2014 was 7,945, representing a341.57% increase from the baseline of 2,326 visits.

title.narrative: Territorial Entities with signed Memoandum of Understanding

comment.narrative: As of June 30, 2014, 86 territorial entities have signed MOUs, which exceeds the established target of 56.

title.narrative: Number of Surveys with Evaluations with PAD / Total Surveys for evaluations

comment.narrative: For 2014, there are 13 eligible evaluations that are expected to contain P.A.D (Programa Acelerado de Datos). All 13 evaluationsare underway and will be completed by December 2014 and thus the 100% target will be met.

title.narrative: Percentage of total evaluations in the approved agenda which reach the design phase.

comment.narrative: For 2014, 11 of the 29 evaluations approved in the evaluation agenda have reached design phase. Considering that this is an annualindicator, the final yearly target is expected to be met by the end of CY14.

title.narrative: Percentage of the total investment budget for which disbursements can be regionally tracked.
